content: Don't buy!!!! I'm 99.9% sure that this third party private seller is having these rebuilt or buying them with the forknowledge of and with non Microsoft certified hardware,which is not at all difficult to do. They will of course deny this. I am very familiar with hardware and the Xbox console. Even the interface is different and it lags doing the most simple of menu tasks . Not to mention the loading icons and colors are all slightly different to the trained eye. Amazon is USA,s ALIBABA.

The Amazon App freezes a lot some of the built-in additional features don't work at all. The app is constantly closing on its own. Additionally, when trying to retrieve my saved list it doesn't scroll it's freezes. And then the app closes so it makes it really difficult to shop for hours at a time and make a purchase. There's a ton of bugs in this app

Prior to the new UI update, I could easily navigate and purchase items I was interested in, now the UI is now garbage; it has been oversimplified to the point of being unintuitive. Instead of a sidebar with useful options listed, there are now just three buttons at the bottom. I'm now stuck pressing button after button trying to find menus that were previously one click away. And if I want to go to the home page, I can't just press home, I have to back out of the menus I entered previously.

I love & use Amazon for so many things, like getting my energy drinks sent to my house. But the app freezes like crazy. If I'm looking at a product w multiple variations it'll freeze up entirely as I click to see the options. Or it'll make the item pic sorta hazy so I can't see the color properly. Or I can't scroll thru the pics to see multiple angles. Sometimes just the item pic freezes, but I can still click the bottom icons. And then it'll just spin trying to load a screen. Needs fixing.

New update caused issues with browsing options. When you click on what you want to look into further, trying to explore other options (different colors of item, sizes, shapes, and so on), it doesnt load. You arent able to see the picture clearly, swipe them, or enlarge them. The only option is to purchase and you are unable to save to favorites. Its very frustrating. Please fix soon! Thanks!

Would be better if it responded the first three times you clicked on something. It does my head in when I try to click, for example "add quantity" and it doesn't respond, only to then click on something completely random. Or if i add something to a list, it takes several goes before it comes up with anything. I get frustrated with this a lot.

I shop on Amazon a lot. But this last app update is a disaster. I don't really like the new interface, but I know I'll adjust. The main issue is glitchy things. I can't scroll through my wishlist anymore. It's stuttering and won't actually scroll down. The whole app in general is so slow to load now and going between sections of the app is a mess.

The products are good quality, never had any complaints. The issue I'm having and it's only been lately is the app. It takes longer to load and I have great internet service so it's not that. The app seems to freeze sometimes to the point when I was trying to add something to my cart I had clear the app from my recent apps and start all over again. It's just frustrating because I pay for prime and apparently I'm paying for an app to work decently half the time hopefully.

Not a fan of the new UI, but it's decent. The really bad thing about the last update, is items that have choices are now broken. You can still choose the other options, but once there, can't scroll through or click on the picture to see the multiple pictures. Seems to be every other option on a page will have this issue. Please fix this ASAP. If I can't see all the pictures to compare, I won't buy. My household approaches 6k spent yearly on Amazon.

The app keeps freezing and each item takes 5 times longer to load. I can't back out or do anything until it unfreezes. And that happens in every screen for every item. I have to go do something else while waiting and waiting! Very frustrating and inefficient. It's faster to get in my car and go shopping at a store for what I need...

Love to shop on Amazon, but the app needs fixing. Lately, when on an item multiply color available, can't bring up the next, only a faded color version shows. Other issue, is a deal breaker. Many times getting just a blank page, as the item trying to show up. Only a restart of my tablet make it work, but happening too often. For years, never had any issues, but this is way too annoying. Please Amazon, pay attention!

I've had this app for years, but recently the Compare prices feature has stopped working altogether from my list. When I add it to the shopping cart that's the only way it works. It isn't the products that's the issue, it just one day stopped working. Tracking packages feature could also use some work. It had trouble scrolling and keeps popping up that "something went wrong" when clicking list or products.

Hate it! Scrolling isn't as smooth. Trying to look at my wish list and I can't get past the first 2 items. It takes forever for an image to load. Adding something on a wishlist is hard as well. The heart takes forever to turn red to add an item. Then you can't view any items because the wishlist does not work. Ever since the update, this app has gotten worse.

I don't if it's just my phone, but every time I put it on in the morning and it doesn't matter how long I leave it, when I open this app it always opens up to a white screen and does nothing then I have to shut the app down completely, then re open it and it works, very frustrating üò§. My phone is S9 plus android 10 If it's the app hope for a fix please. Thanks.

Don't love it, don't hate it. The app works all right, but sometimes it gives me an error after loading the page I want. Being a prime member not everything is delivered in the promised 2 day delivery. Even if you check prime when searching, the search tool is awful at filtering that out so when you get to check out, you're annoyed and disappointed and have to look again for an actual prime item or risk not getting the third party seller item if shipping isn't ridiculous. It's just all right.

Recent updates does not allow you to browse different color choices and/or options, swiping through photos is unreliable. Many times trying to swipe through pictures, the app won't even respond. I now tend to just open the web browser and browse Amazon that way. Pretty worthless update. I'm using a Pixel 4A, and it is not my phone. I have no trouble browsing the web version of the Amazon site.

Love Amazon shopping, but this app is a disaster and always has been. It's never gotten better in all the years I've used it despite the updates. It's slower than the old dial-up internet, it frequently freezes, scrolling often isn't smooth, buttons aren't always responsive, and the pictures and videos not loading is a common occurrence. With all the money Amazon makes, you'd think they'd invest in a functional app.

What happened Amazon? Last few months this app has become plagued with bugs. Deleting/moving items in lists can take up to a minute for the 3 steps! Pages will disappear, and upon an auto-reload, it defaults to the home page üòí Search results are a joke at times, the auto-correct does nothing to "correct" your search terms half the time. Someone, please, consider an overhaul of the front-end of this app. Trying to scroll within lists causes "jumping", where it wants to scroll the other way! Ugg.

Dreadful Update since Sept 2021. The app is now slow, common uses come up slowly and are not logically placed. I've been using the Amazon app for years and this is by far the poorest update ever. For example, finding order updates is now a multi step process and slow. I don't see any advantages of the new UI. The logo change last year was poorly executed as well.

I have found with the vision issues I have developed for the last year or so. It has been becoming harder to read and see the print is to light. It would be nice if you incorporated a dark mode where black background and white print I find easier to read. Plus those with dyslexia also do better with dark mode for which I do have and has been acting up as well plus it would be nice if you also incorporate the ability To Adjust text size and style along with text to speech.

The latest update is horrible. I shop on Amazon because I have a wider range of product styles/colors/better quality for what I need/want at reasonable prices instead of having to settle for what's available at the local store and cost twice as much. The design before this latest update was perfect and user friendly, but now, it is just awful.

The app had become progressively slower with recent updates, but still usable. The Oct 6th update however has now made it almost impossible to use. Scrolling and navigating through menus and pages is a struggle, with pages sometimes even freezing altogether. I thought it was just my 3 year old phone struggling, but even a much newer phone with a much more powerful Snapdragon 765G chipset is struggling. Going back to the website for now as I can barely use the app anymore.

Stop changing the layout of the app and now you have made it nearly impossible for me to return items that either didn't work or weren't as described. I have been super disappointed with Amazon these last few months, between items never arriving and now trying to do a return. The fact that the app keeps crashing and pages won't load properly make it all the less appealing.

The app works great, makes it all so easy to find what you need. But I am very disappointed with the payment (checkout) procedure since past 3-4days. It just keeps declining. I dnt know if its the payment gateway error or something to do with amazon, but after complaining all I hear is that I might have made a mistake in entering the details. This issue is for Amazon.in

Since the update beginning of May 2021 the app performance is terrible. Lag times in searches, can't always see past orders and subscriptions. Very often get the 'uh oh something went wrong on our end' message. Revert back to the old one for goodness sake, at least that worked. Edited October 2021 - still issues. Pretty much useless unless you have wifi on, so then what's the point?! Frustrating and annoying. Come on Amazon, put some of your profits into creating a usable app.

Ever since the last update, app is mostly useless for shopping. When viewing an item details, app completely freezes after about 20 seconds. You can hit the back button. But then it no longer receives any more data from the internet. So you get a lot of blank pages. You have to close the app and reopen it. But if you go back to viewing an items details, it freezes again. Currently the app is only useful for viewing your account or tracking a shipment. It does not freeze doing those actions.

This last update has been a pain. Keeps freezing, glitching, can no longer see the different prices on colors/sizes without clicking on each item and option. Used to be great. Because of all the issues, I've spent a couple hundred dollars on other sites because I've been frustrated with Amazon and not willing to restart my searches 30 times to get 1 item.

If you want to buy something you have already/ text searched for or that Amazon suggests it's great. If however you want to browse by category there is no option anymore. Scroll all the way to the bottom for 'all categories/depts/ it just takes you back up to the top of almo st an identical page, no way to pick, books, clothes, pet products, hardware, just loads of things you've probably already looked at, but no easy way to just shop without an algorithm directing you.

App constantly freezes and pics won't load. I'm using a new Samsung Galaxy S21+ . All other apps work fine. Home page content isn't consistent or relevant. Frequent programs shows programs I've never used! Deals constantly refresh and you lose your place when browsing. When shopping after style ratings, most items are currently unavailable. I buy most household items and toiletries through Prime. Lately I just get frustrated when shopping and give up. Also, too many scam sellers.

When it works, it's good, but only slightly better than just using the website. However, the app crashes a lot. I can normally look at an item page for 3 seconds before I get a picture of a dog and the words "Uh oh - Something went wrong" This has been the case for months and months. I find it easier to visit the website in my browser, but doing that will often mean the app tries to start up... It's a pain.

They've removed a lot of the clutter to streamline the app, but in doing so, they have also managed to remove entire features. Would you like to browse by department? Sucks for you. Want to search something specific? Sorry, Amazon's search algorithm is still hot, salted garbage. Much functionality available on desktop is either hidden under a maze of unnecessary menus or absent entirely. The app is actively hostile to use.

Dang Amazon app at it again... They won't allow me to change my default list anymore. Had that option on the old app, idk why change it -, - everything is out of place and you have to tap then hover then tap then hover again just to get to a simple area, the old app is a click of a button. Smh ü§¶üèª Update: 10/19/2021 Thanks to the new update, whole looking at item photos, it's sooo slow it freezes and takes a while to view the next photo. Please fix Amazon. Dropped another star.

Overall the app is pretty good. But there's a glitch that I really want fixed. Sometimes when I scroll down one of my wishlists it doesn't let me scroll smoothly. I scroll and then it stops, then goes, then stops and makes it very annoying to try to make it down my wishlist. Sometimes I don't even try to make it all the way down. If you can fix this, Amazon, I'd really appreciate it.

The person who said it is working flawlessly is either a liar, or works for Amazon. The updated app keeps glitching: can't see pricing for all colors, it gets stuck on a page, won't scroll, won't go back, goes to error screen. I spend so much time force stopping the app, only to have it happen again IMMEDIATELY, that it isn't convenient anymore. Bezos is raking in the cash, only to provide services that are getting progressively worse. I'm going to the store, could use the vitamin D anyway.

Refreshes view every few seconds when looking at deals, which moves where you are on the list, and by the time you get back to where you were, it refreshes and does it again. If you want to make sure people will give up and close the app instead of maybe buying something, design your app like Amazon's. If you actually want people to stay on your app and use it, look at the Amazon app for examples of what *not* to do.

As per other reviews - lately the app isn't running smoothly - takes an age to load a page or won't at all - also when clicking on different items the page doesn't load - just not smooth or fast enough and makes it a very frustrating experience, especially when I'm paying monthly for the service. I think the whole app needs a modern retake/refresh on it. (P.S - Please change the logo, or give a choice of different styles - really don't like this one üòî)

Installed the app so I could chat with customer service. The app not only lagged, but my cursor would jump all around the page. While I was typing my message random prepared replies would enter the conversation. I never got a reply to what I wrote. I ended up uninstalling the app since I couldn't even use it for its intention. I'd give it 0 stars if I could.

Laggy and clunky. Awful functionality and UI. Search filters does not work properly and on purpose shows irrelevant (pushed by Amazon) items. Prime subscription is fine as long as you use few services and like convenience of Prime delivery. But other services like Prime video, books, music, etc is sooo meh... Really depends on how you use it.

Never had an issue until tonight. Clicked a link on social and redirected to the app. Out of the blue it changed the language from english to french. Figured out how to change it back by googling it and thankfully a link that took me straight there and selected English and saved. Appeared to work until I left that page and it's still in French. Went back and tried 3 times to get it to save and it doesn't. Had to uninstall and reinstall to fix it.

Love amazon, but after update I can no longer use voice to text option and only the Alexa option and it cuts me off half the time or doesn't get it right when I try to speak and say what I'm looking for. I have severe arthritis and typing is hard and painful for me so I depend on voice to text. Ironically I do not have this issue in Chrome. Only in the app so until the issue is resolved I'm reducing my 5 stars to give three stars to an app I love very much but not happy with currently

It's slow AF! When they redesigned it, it made the speedy process slow AF, and those delays of making the next screen is horrendous! Whoever came up with all that loading time in the programming needs not only more training, but their *ss whooped! It still works, don't get me wrong, but that's why the 2 star drop, the speed vs the old way.

Annoying UI design created to maximize clicking and increase browsing time. Examples: 1. It is ridiculous to get a smaller number of results when you sort by price low to high, vs. high to low. 2. No back/return arrow if you use a phone with swipe enabled navigation. So if you swipe left, the app will completely exit your search, and bring you to the home page. You cannot return to your search. 3. Printing. It is 2021 and the app redirects you to a BROWSER sign in to print labels.

the "auto-renew on/off" and the "advanced controls" links, used to cancel prime channels in "manage subscription", are no longer listed in the list of prime channels. i had to call amazon to cancel auto-renew. they are constantly making changes to the moving the subscription menu to the extent i suspect amazon is purposely doing this as an impediment to force the customers to keep the channels out of frustration for having to figure out their ever changing access to managing subscriptions.

Honestly this app is kind of a mess. It's got a lot of nifty features (barcode lookup, AR clothing... etc.) but it's bloated, slow, and clearly has a memory leak because it gets progressively laggier the longer you use it. Bizarre requirement to turn on ALL notifications if you want to order through Amazon Smile. There's potential but as it stands this is a downgrade from just using the website, even on mobile.

The Last 2 AMAZON APP updates performance wise are horribly bad! Laggy isn't a good enough adjective to properly describe the screen freezes, the unresponsiveness of this app! I mean my wife and I can't even swipe through pictures of a product on both of our phones without it just staying Frozen, until it eventually moves on its own! Both of our phones have the App updated and our phones act exactly the same with this app!So it is clearly the messed-up software of this app! Need New Developer's!

When you select music category from the top of the home screen it tries to get you to sign up for Music Unlimited. There is no way to close this offer screen, so there is no way to browse music. This is asinine. Especially as the music app no longer lets you shop for music within the app. Not having a way to provide feedback within the app is also poorly designed.

My app on my Samsung Note 20 stopped working a couple days ago. I've tried uninstalling and reinstalling, but it didn't help. The app opens, but all I get is the picture of the dog saying "oops, something went wrong." And a "Go Home" button. If ai click the "Go Home" button, I also get the picture of the dog and "Oops.... Something went wrong." I have not added any recent apps or changed any settings on my phone at all. The Amazon Shopping app on my phone is totally unusable and worthless.

Since 10/23 the shopping app is having A LOT of problems.. freezing, lagging, reloading old items just stop functioning intermittently after a few minutes of seamlessly working. I'm constantly having to restart my phone because it just freezes. I've tried changing connection from WiFi to Mobile Data while on the app and it doesn't make a difference. Hope the developer can issue an update or fix soon because I do a lot of shopping through this app. Never had a problem until now.

I used to like it a lot. I had to change phones to something that worked better in rural areas (Galaxy S7 Edge), and Amazon Shopping no longer works on that Android OS version at all. Too old or something. That surprised me! Anyway, I downloaded Walmart and NewEgg to try. They seem to work fine. So, I guess it's no big.

The app is bugging out. It's unresponsive to touch for about 3 to 5 seconds, it's laggy and when I look at a product most of the time it just straight up freeze. This is not good for a app that you use to buy stuff online it can cause accidental or wrong purchases. Cleared cache and data uninstalled and reinstalled it still same thing. Have to order stuff off my computer

Latest update broke app on Android phone. Can hardly shop on this app anymore. Pages freeze when you try to select different product options, such as colors or styles available on single product pages. It also won't let you view photos for the different options unless you navigate to that specific style or color from the main search listing. This is terrible. I'm actually shopping other sites now because it's a burden to try to shop Amazon with these new issues. Been an issue for weeks.

The links in their Emails re orders and tracking emails do not work, if you click on the link there's a message saying the page doesnt exist, and asks if you want Amazon Home Page. Whats the point in them sending emails with corrupted links! Spoke to Amazon customer services several times but was given the "go away and dont bother me" help. Not helpful, is it!

Used to work great. Now it glitches, you can't scroll through your wish lists without it sticking or lagging. They should also make it much easier to organize your lists, like being able to select multiple items to move them to a different list instead of having to move one at a time and then having to scroll all the way back to the next item to move over. Needs a MAJOR update ASAP

The app is super laggy when scrolling, has a slow response rate to touch on the screen. It usually times out trying to load just one simple task like scrolling or trying to flip through the pictures. Most of the text links are unresponsive and when you manage to get it to register, that times it out more often than you can actually get them to work. When browsing, it takes so long to load the next page of items.

Always getting items late, what's the point on paying 14 dollars a month for prime if items still not arriving in time. That's false advertisement it says 2 days and you'll get your items in 3 or 4 days. The point on paying is to get your Tuff fast, in that case is better to go to the store and buy them from them or better yet switch to Walmart.

Horrible company. I use to like them for my own convenience. But shortly after, my account(s) just started erroneously getting "locked-out" and although I've followed THEIR instructions to help them resolve the issue, it still isn't helpful and impossible to get in contact with that particular part of the department to inquire. It's been months and I'm still locked out with no recourse. However, it only conviently locks you out when you have funds within your account. They are crooks!

Impossible to find the choice to change country/language settings in the new version when you want to find a product in another country and ship over to you. There's a drop down list of options all to do with user experience but nothing for language/region. Why? After Brexit it's important to consider this option to find as easily as before but for some reason it's completely gone or hidden in settings. An American company should be sensitive to the cultural demands of other continents.

Used to be good, but now it's very slow. The app opens quickly as normal, but some things inside the app can be very slow. When I pull up my orders it takes 12-14 seconds. It used to be very quick. And the sponsored search results are getting absurd. Can't even find the item you typed in perfectly until after wading through dozens of unrelated results. Amazon has figured out that they make more money in fees for sponsored junk items than they do by selling you what you wanted originally.

Amazon I would have left at least a 4 star rating but after this last app update I can barely get the app to work. It freezes up when I try to turn pages on a item , it goes blank at times , it will sometimes half load the images so they can't be clocked on , I could on and on . For the largest retailer in the world you app people are idiots

Latest updates broke the app on android. Crashes all the time. Locks up when changing a product option, the photos can not be viewed when selecting a different product option. None of that was an issue, have been using the app for years until the latest updates. This is unacceptable, you are amazon, not some start up!

Latest update causes app to lag and freeze. Searching for anything takes forever, and even then sometimes the results won't even populate because the app has crashed. A fix is definitely needed. And what's up with the shipping???? If we're paying for the 2 day shipping and can't get it anymore due to the pandemic or whatever reason, subscription costs need to be lowered or something else needs to be added to our subscription for free.

Amazon US works fine. Amazon UK is a scam. They take the money from your account and in 2 or 3 weeks, they notify you that your purchase is "undeliverable". They issue a refund in 2 more weeks. They collect interest on your money for a month, but there is not a single product that IS deliverable. After a dozen attempts to buy my partner in Northern Ireland a gift and being embarrassed by Amazon UKs refusal to actually sell a product, I'll never use it again. Worst business ever.

Love the convenince but not last update. On product pages certain options won't fully load the product photos, so you can't see all photos nor heart them. Viewing the wishlists now has problem when you scroll down a few items it bounces you back up as if you have reached the end of your list. I found scrolling back up a lil and then scrolling back down quickly makes rest of the items load. I saw a new feat. order $35 of eligible items will be delivered same day. The "time window" I got was wrong

Service is slipping. Not Amazon but the app. It was user friendly. All of a sudden every page I click I get an Error Go Back to Home. I click go back, Error. I close and open, Error. I uninstall then reinstall, Error. The app needs to be fixed. I can't halloween shop. My daughters bday is coming up. I'm just gonna order from Ebay if they can't fix this. As for issues with the company I give those a 1 star. Can't get 2 day shipping. Lost packages. Drivers not reading instructions. It's simple...

Amazon app and prime have been great up til the last week. App isn't working properly, missing items upon delivery and my store credit is gone and I know for sure I haven't used it yet, what the ef is going on with Amazon????! The issue with the app is the only tab that works properly is the home tab. My account tab, cart and the rest just lags or says that something is wrong on your end. I'm close to deleting my account, if only there was a working app to do it on... FIX THIS PLZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ

Love Amazon. Used to love shopping with this app. Beginning about a week ago, it glitches and freezes so often. About to stop shopping with it because the experience is so awful. It even is so bad it double ordered an item. Once the glitching, freezing, and crashing is fixed then this will go back to a five star review.

I love this app. It's much easier than the desktop version. It look different on my partner's note than my s9 but it runs perfectly fine and fast. It definitely make shopping easier. The image search is okay since it doesn't find what I want in the picture, but I can find my past purchase pretty easy. I also like the refund straight to my account super fast and easy. Overall, this Amazon app is incredible.

Something's up with the item options. Whenever I tap to view a different color of an item the image freezes and refuses to load. Can't scroll through the images or anything. Uninstalled and redownloaded to see if that would fix the issue but nope, no good. May want to check out what's going on

The new UI/UX design sucks!! No logout button lol. Test your app thoroughly before you release. And all the options got congested and difficult to identify which is where. All the useless stuff popping up. Some senseless names like 1-click settings is the idiotic name I ever heard to edit addresses! Common Amazon! I liked your UI during 2018 and 2019. Not anymore. Time to lose the competition ü§† Please change the management or hire back your UI/UX team back to it was in the year of 2019!

Horrible update. Please fix ASAP. Uninstalled and reinstalled to see if that fixed access problems, but no. I cannot access the menu items other than shopping and cart, so not able to access lists, change personal information, or even log off via the app. This is a security risk to stay logged into! You must fix this asap or roll back to prior update until properly fixed. Tried using online only, but is painfully slow.

I don't like the new interface or design. It's clunky and no longer intuitive. Also the app is constantly freezing up. Also Amazon's search filters are absolutely useless. All the searches are so full of sponsored items, which don't even fit my search criteria, that it's almost impossible to find anything on Amazon now.

I enjoy using the app to search and place my orders. I have never had an issue. The one thing I wish the app would do is make it easier for the user to know what is causing the app icon to show you have a message waiting with the red numbers. You have to guess and search through the menues what tripped the notification with the red number and sometimes never find the reason. Other than that the app is great.

I HATE that the new update took the pages away from search results! Replacing them with "load more." The pages made it easy to go back to an item I was interested in and choose after shopping the other pages. Its like they took the shelf away at the store and now are the products are a mixed up mess on the aisle. This will ABSOLUTELY DETER ME FROM shopping with this app(which is 99% of my amazon shopping experience). Hope you change it back soon!!

Was just made aware by a driver I had the wrong address on my packages. Wasn't even aware because multiple orders still got delivered with no problem. When I selected billing address as the same as my shipping address the app should of picked up on the error. Props to the delivery guy that noticed & to the other ones who still delivered my packages as well.

Not sure what they've done to the app but I've no idea how to navigate round it now! When I click 'buy' nothing happens, & I can't search for music without being hassled by amazon prime. Who thought searching for & downloading music would be so hard! There's a saying...'if it ain't broke....'. Amazon clearly missed that memo!

This app is constantly a problem for me. It boots me out randomly or kicks me back to the home screen. I can't scroll through any of my lists because it bounces back to the top. Major complaint is let me set my own search parameters. Just let me set the price I want to see. Not items between $x and $x. I don't understand how it's 2021 and this app acts like it's a decade old. I understand marketing but I don't want to use an app that is 90% harassing marketing and 10% products. I'm done with it.

Used to love it but Everytime I try and chat with customer service now the box I type in to is covered up with my keyboard. My phone is up to date and I've uninstalled and installed the app several times so it's definitely the app itself. It's very slow also and crashes a lot. My phone is brand new so I know it's not my phone. No problems with any other app except this one.

I dislike the new icon. It makes it harder to find in my phone apps. More importantly since the icon has changed it is SO SLOW!!!!! It is fine when I search for an item but once I click on the item and try to choose different options from the seller, the app completely freezes. I have to shut it down and start all over. It is way to frustrating for me to use. I feel my blood pressure rising when I try to shop on this app!! I will try again in a few weeks. Do better Amazon!

I hate the new logo. They should bring back the old one. The new one makes me not want to click on it. So ugly. I haven't updated my app, cuz I don't want the new one, so I still have the old logo. Also, prime deliveries are not always 2 day deliveries or prime delivery. Have to wait a week sometimes. Not worth paying for prime if theres no benefit. I'm planning on canceling b4 I get charged again.

Sadly even after update the Canadian app isn't fixed, Only the universal ones are fixed except the Canadian app, which still has the same issue with freezing and unable to add or proceed to checkout. I've been with Amazon for over 10 years, purchases from Amazon universal and local ... Why am I paying my Prime locally and having to deal with this.
